review: Two major flaws: First, you will have to plug this thing into your wall outlet if you want to have a chance to get reception. Yet another device to plug into an already stuffed power strip. This is barely talked about in the sales literature. Second, if the device has network problems, trying to recover through the Settings does no good; you must unplug the thing and let it reboot. Other than these really annoying things it works really well and has an easy-to-use interface.
author: John B. Baker

review: Love the Fire Stick.  I can stream from all my various devices, phone, kindle, laptop.  Some of the channels are kind of quirky, but love the access I have to Pandora, You Tube, Netflixs etc.  Even like the screen saver.  Great little device!
